description: The number of steps before reaching 1 or a repeated value, or -1 if neither occur, when starting at k = n and iterating k -> k/Lpf(k) - 1 if Omega(k) is even, else k -> k*Lpf(k) + 1, where Lpf(k) (A020639) is the least prime dividing k and Omega(k) (A001222) is the number of prime divisors of k counted with multiplicity.
